doc:
Leon Belasco https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leon_Belasco 0 Leon Belasco (11 October 1902 – 1 June 1988), born Leonid Simeonovich Berladsky, was a Russian-American musician and actor who had a 60-year career in film and television from the 1920s to the 1980s, appearing in more than 100 films. Leon_Belasco ( 11_October_1902 – 1_June_1988 ) , born Leonid_Simeonovich_Berladsky , was a_Russian-American_musician and actor who had a_60-year_career in film_and_television from the_1920s to the_1980s , appearing in more_than_100_films .
